markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Subtle Delivery](/Feats.aspx?ID=1593) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 4), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You can capably deliver toxins with a [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66). Your blowgun Strikes can apply [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poisons even if they deal no damage due to a creature's resistance. If you critically succeed at an attack roll using a blowgun loaded with a dart you've poisoned and the target rolls a failure on the poison's initial save, the target critically fails instead.
name: Subtle Delivery

summary_markdown: You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Subtle Delivery Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 106 2.0 Archetypes Poisoner (Level 4), Poisoner (Level 4) --- You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun. Your blowgun Strikes can apply injury poisons even if they deal no damage due to a creature's resistance. If you critically succeed at an attack roll using a blowgun loaded with a dart you've poisoned and the target rolls a failure on the poison's initial save, the target critically fails instead.
